segments.text: I see the girl standing next to the boy, looking up at him with such expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her arm raised, palm open, ready to receive the treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, and it makes me feel a bit sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's relying on the boy to get the cookies for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is doing his best, but the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of concern for both of them, hoping they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is still drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being quite patient, but also a bit sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies, but I also hope they don't get into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
